title: 407 Fairmount. Close to Lake, Piedmont Avenue, Very Clean, New Carpet
posting_body: ['Please be advised that unauthorized Craigslist ads exist posing as The Lapham Company.', 'If you have any concerns about the  legitimacy of our ads please contact us immediately at', 'show contact info', '.', 'Photos are of a representative apartment in the building.', 'The currently available unit may differ from the unit pictured above.', '407 Fairmount Ave., Oakland, CA 94611, 210', '407 Fairmount.', 'Close to Lake, Piedmont Avenue, Very Clean, New Carpet, $1,825.00', 'Brand new photos up!', 'Available now!', 'New Special Offer: $1000 Cash Bonus At Move In!', 'Total credit applied at Move in & Security Deposit fee waived!', 'Please contact leasing agent for more details.', 'For an Appointment to View, please contact: Maria office:', 'show contact info', 'Key Features:', 'Unit Type:', 'Apartment', 'Bedrooms:', '1', 'Bathrooms:', '1', 'Rent:', '$1,825.00/month', 'Deposit:', '$0.00', 'Parking:', 'None', 'Pets:', 'Cats Allowed (Extra deposit may be required), No Dogs', 'Utilities:', 'Water and Garbage Included', 'Kitchen:', 'Electric stove', 'Laundry:', 'Coin-operated Laundry', 'Total Units:', '41', 'Lease Term:', 'Year lease', 'Unit Description:', 'Great location, walk to Lake Merritt, Piedmont Ave.', 'Whole Foods Market', 'Good light', 'Balcony', 'Granite countertops', 'Updated appliances', 'Bright kitchen', 'Electric stove', 'Carpeted', 'Very well maintained', 'Very clean', 'Landlord pays water and garbage', 'Modern Construction', 'Coin operated laundry on-site', 'Well kept landscaping', 'On-site manager', 'Location Description:', 'City of Oakland', 'Alameda County', 'Great hidden nieghborhood in Oakland', 'Quiet street near Downtown - walk to Kaiser Center, Ordway, and Summit Medical Center "Pill Hill"', 'Easy commute to Downtown Oakland!', 'Located on Fairmount between 29th and Garland.', 'Walk to Whole Foods Market!', 'Walk to Lake Merritt', 'Walk to Piedmont Ave. outstanding restuarants, shops, bars, and coffee houses', 'Minutes to San Francisco, Berkeley, Hayward, and San Leandro', 'Quick access to major highways 580, 880, 24, and 13', 'Approximately 1 Mile to 19th Street BART', 'Approximately 1.3 Miles to Macarthur BART', 'Bus stops for AC Transit nearby on MacArthur Blvd. and Grand Ave', 'Contact info:', 'Maria office:', 'show contact info', 'Or Contact Lapham Office at', 'show contact info', 'Office Hours are 9-5pm Closed for Lunch 12-1pm', 'For applications or to view more listings, please visit our website by copying and pasting this link into your browsers address bar   <URL>', 'BRE# 00931216 Copyright © 2022, The Lapham Company, Inc.', 'All Rights Reserved.', 'The Lapham Company, Inc. believes all material to be correct but assumes no legal responsibility for the accuracy.', 'All units subject to prior rental, change or withdrawal without notice.']
